name: Sandwich Sadness (2022 Team 11)
description:
Welcome to Sandwich Sadness, a game where you live out your most reachable aspirations: working in the food service industry. With horrible customers, and an even worse landlord, take on each day with a smile forced onto you by your employer as you assemble sandwiches. With your combined willpower, ability to manage multiple customers simultaneously, and your mouse and keyboard, nothing can stop you from giving customers what they need, other than the customers of course.

INSTRUCTIONS: Use your mouse to click on dialogue options and sandwich ingredients to build your sandwiches. Drag your fingers across the keys to play the minigames that pop up, and drag your sandwiches onto the customers to feed it to them.
